April 24, 2016 D Holme Valley Brass Band Contest (Section A)
Holme Valley Brass Band Contest (Section A) 10 Hymn & Own Choice Test Piece Contest Holme Valley Brass Band Contest holme-valley-brass-band-contest-a
Civic Hall, Holmfirth 90th Edition
Highest Second Section Band: Slaithwaite Outstanding Euphonium: Jolyon Stead, City of Bradford Outstanding Conductor: Lee Skipsey, City of Bradford Outstanding Bass Section: City of Bradford Outstanding Soloist: Dave Karren (Cornet), City of Bradford Highest Placed Holme Valley Band (Test Piece): Hade Edge Highest Placed Holme Valley Band (Hymn Tune): Hade Edge
Hymn Tune: 1. City of Bradford 2. Hebden Bridge
April 29, 2016, 12:30 p.m. May 28, 2017, 7:20 a.m.
